price: Sheyxaanni gara isaatti hasaasee: nijedhe “Yaa Aadam! Gara muka (as keessa) turiinsaatiifi mootummaa hin dhabamne irratti si qajeelchuu?” {1}
arabic: فَوَسۡوَسَ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ قَالَ يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ وَمُلۡكٖ لَّا يَبۡلَىٰ
footnotes: {1} hiikkaan muka yoo isa nyaatte zalaalam jannata keessa teessu, mootummaa hindhumne mootuu sigarsiisuu? jedheen sheyxaanni aadamiin.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fawaswasa ilayhi al-shayṭānu qāla yāādamu hal adulluka ʿalā shajarati al-khul'di wamul'kin lā yablā
